title: GridPP Phase 3
abstractText: We will maintain the Manchester computer farm, and coordinate the whole NorthGrid Tier2 service of similar farms We will provide and maintain security services for GridPP, enabling users to use computers across the grid in a safe way This is a part of the GridPP3 proposal which can be viewad at http://www.gridpp.ac.uk/docs/gridpp3
impactText: Establishment of the Grid, for analysis of LHC data, including the discovery of the Higgs Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections Cultural
findingsText: How to lInk many computers for accomplishing large data analysis tasks. We called it 'the Grid' but theidea is now better known as 'the cloud'. Thhis enabled the :LHC exeperiments to analyse their data Further linking of commodity computers for data tasks Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software)
